issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Supports reducing mass incarceration, ending mandatory minimum sentences, and promoting rehabilitation programs

issues.title: Affordable Healthcare
issues.description: Strong supporter of expanding Medicare and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal funding for public schools, student debt relief, and expanded community college programs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal framework, renewable energy investments, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports raising federal minimum wage to $15 per hour and indexing it to inflation

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Voting Rights Protection
issues.description: Advocates for expanding voting access, opposing voter suppression, and supporting the John Lewis Voting Rights Act
